values: 原谅；宽恕；饶恕；免除（债务）；赦免；容忍；不追究；停止怀恨；放过；免去（责任或义务）；请原谅；对不起

sample.mean: v. 克制；自制；忍耐；容忍；克制住不做；避免使用
v. 不许；禁止；不准…做某事；禁止（或不准）…进入；使…成为不可能；阻止；制止
v. 发誓放弃；坚决抛弃；作伪证；发伪誓

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 门外, 外边, 外部的(=out of doors, outside)

word_mean_info__list.difference: 比excuse正式，指原谅或宽恕严重的过失或法律上的犯罪行为；在社会交场合则指对打搅他人表示歉意。
语气较弱，指宽容或不计较无关大局的过失。
侧重从心里宽恕某人，暗示放弃一切愤恨和要求报偿的权利。
口语常用词，语气较轻。指原谅轻微的过错、疏忽或过失。

word_group.brief_definition: 犯错人皆难免；宽恕则属超凡
word_group.phrase: to err is human, to forgive divine

word_group.brief_definition: 请原谅我；饶恕我；谅解我
恕罪；原谅错误；宽容错误

bilingual.source: Try to forgive someone when they apologise.
bilingual.target: 当别人道歉时，试着原谅他们。

bilingual.source: But we should try to forgive, even if we can't forget.
bilingual.target: 但我们应该尝试原谅，即使不能忘记。

bilingual.source: He finds it hard to forgive himself.
I had to beg him to forgive me.
bilingual.target: 我不得不央求他原谅我。

bilingual.source: I will forgive you just this once.

list.abstract: Forgive（英 [fəˈɡɪv]，美 [fərˈɡɪv]），英语单词。可做动词用，指原谅、饶恕、宽恕。也可做及物动词、不及物动词，作及物动词时意为原谅，免除债务、义务等；作不及物动词时意为原谅。英语短语有forgive me，译为请原谅我、饶恕我。例句为Forgive me if I have presumed.（若有冒犯，敬请原谅。） Forgive的第三人称单数：forgives，现在分词：forgiving，过去式：forgave，过去分词：forgiven，近义词为discharge、pardon for。

yingyinNormal.en: I think we can forgive him.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我觉得我们可以原谅他。

yingyinNormal.en: Do you forgive me? Do you love me?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你原谅我吗？你爱我吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Forgive me. I was too blind to see.
yingyinNormal.zh: 原谅我我贪欲迷心没能发现。
yingyinNormal.videoNameEn: 《The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies》

yingyinNormal.en: You'll forgive them for being a little uptight.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你得原谅他们可能有点紧张过度。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh! Mother Barnabas, forgive me. Get over there.
yingyinNormal.zh: 芭芭拉修女，请您原谅！别挡路。

yingyinNormal.en: Forgive me for using East and West kind of loosely.
yingyinNormal.zh: 原谅我很不严格地使用东方和西方。

yingyinNormal.en: Forgive me, Lawrence. I don't know what came over me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 原谅我，劳伦斯，我不知道怎么了？
yingyinNormal.videoNameEn: 《Night at the Museum: Secret of the Tomb》

yingyinNormal.en: If anything happens to that kid, I'll never forgive myself.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他要是有个什么三长两短的，我坚决不会原谅我自己。

yingyinNormal.en: Please, John, forgive me, for all the hurt that I caused you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 求你了，约翰，原谅我，原谅我带给你的所有伤害。

yingyinNormal.en: Forgive me, madam, for taking up so much of your time.
yingyinNormal.zh: 原谅我，小姐，耽搁了你这么多的时间。

yingyinNormal.en: You don't have to forgive him. But we shouldn't forget him.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你不用原谅他，但我们不能忘记他。

yingyinNormal.en: Forgive me, but are you acquainted with him, with Mr Darcy?
yingyinNormal.zh: 请原谅我的冒昧 你和达西先生很熟吗？

yingyinNormal.en: You don't understand. I lied to him. He'll never forgive me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你不懂，我骗了他，他再也不会原谅我了。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm so sorry. If it's not too late, please forgive me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我非常抱歉，如果还不太晚的话，请你原谅我吧。
yingyinNormal.videoNameZh: 《爱丽丝梦游仙境2：镜中奇遇记》

yingyinNormal.en: I can't, I can't do it, John. I don't know how. Forgive me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我做不到，约翰，我做不到，我不会这个，请原谅我。

yingyinNormal.en: Now, look, I'm not trying to ask you to forgive him being in that photograph.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我不会试着让你们原谅他出现在那张照片中。

yingyinNormal.en: I would never forgive myself if I put too much on your plate too soon.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果我操之过急让你压力太大，我绝不会原谅自己。

yingyinNormal.en: Amy just burned Jo's manuscript. I don't see how he could ever forgive her.
yingyinNormal.zh: 爱美刚烧了乔的稿子，我看他永远不会原谅她。

yingyinNormal.en: Forgive me for eavesdropping, but as I see it, there's a simple solution.
yingyinNormal.zh: 原谅我偷听了，但在我看来，有一个简单的解决办法。

yingyinNormal.en: Hope you'll forgive me. For? I was meeting Vice President Francis Underwood. I thought he deserved a good story.
yingyinNormal.zh: 希望你能原谅我。原谅什么？我那天见到了副总统弗兰西斯·安德伍德，我觉得应该给他讲个精彩的传说。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: v. 原谅；饶恕；宽恕；请宽容；免除；请原谅

examination_example.sentence: But now most colleges, save for many selective campuses, allow all undergraduates, and even graduate students, to get their low grades <highlight>forgiven</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但是现在大多数大学，除了一些重点大学，允许所有的本科生，甚至研究生，都可以得到对他们低分的原谅。

v. 发誓放弃；坚决抛弃；作伪证；发伪誓

word_family.mean: v. 原谅；饶恕；宽恕；请宽容；免除；请原谅

sense_info_list.en: stop feeling angry or resentful toward someone for an offense, flaw, or mistake

examination_example.sentence: If taxpayers are to bear the cost of <highlight>forgiving</highlight> student loans, shouldn't they have a say in how their money is used?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果纳税人要承担免除学生贷款的费用，难道他们不应该对自己的钱该怎么用有发言权吗？

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 宽大的；慈悲的；易于摆弄的；安全的

word_family.mean: v. 原谅；饶恕；宽恕；请宽容；免除；请原谅

examination_example.sentence: People who <highlight>forgive</highlight> show less sadness, anger and stress and more hopefulness, according to a recent research.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 根据最近的一项研究，原谅别人的人表现出更少的悲伤、愤怒和压力，更有希望。

examination_example.sentence: To <highlight>forgive</highlight> is a virtue, but no one has ever said it is easy.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 原谅是一种美德，但从来没有人说过这很容易。
